page.title: 15Where people work.
page.content: Within the countryside areas you find that some people work the land and are {farmers}and their workers. As you reach the villages and out- skirts of Bishop'Stortford you find that there are some facilities for employment in{light engineering}and {car maintainance workshops.}Other sources include{local traders}and {sales assistants and public services. The{local airport}also provides many job opportunities. Larger neighbouring towns withdraw some of the work force for a variety of jobs associated with every town. In recent years there has been a predominant growth in the number of {commuters}who travel to a variety of jobs in the{City of London}and this has now become an important feature of the local employment situation. Unemployment in the area is low.
